summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Wedding Photography Guest View. All backend APIs (19 tests) passed. Frontend UI testing verified all major features working correctly including header slideshow, galleries, lightbox, and elegant dividers.

issues: Minor React warning: 'Received true for a non-boolean attribute jsx' - cosmetic warning, does not affect functionality

critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper data-testid attributes for testing
Lazy loading and async decoding properly implemented for images
API endpoints properly exclude MongoDB _id field
Sample images fallback works correctly when no custom images uploaded
test_credentials: None required - testing public guest view
seed_data_creation: None - used existing data in database
context_for_next_testing_agent: All public APIs working. Guest view fully functional. Lightbox requires force=True click due to hover overlay. Background images endpoint returns empty array (uses sample images fallback). Photos stored as base64 in MongoDB.
